resources.string: Main app config
Default behavior is to do NOT ring if phone was in silence or vibrate-only mode before call (configurable)
Number of seconds between two sound increase actions also affects vibrate and mute before ring option
Ringer volume limits
Allow to limit min and max ring volume \nSetting limit to 0 or -1 are for advanced max limit config. To enable mute/vibrate functions use suitable switch
When setting limit to prering value - check full description for \'Restore volume\'
Restore volume after call
Default behaviour is to restore pre-call level
Be careful when you use this with max volume level limit = prering, because restore to 1 after call with max level = prering will give you no volume increase
Vibration config
Gives option to vibrate before ringing. Can cause vibration only with no ringtone without proper configuration. \nSee full description

There are devices that do not support switch from mute/vibrate to normal ring mode during call. They stay vibrate-only even after volume increase. 
Solution is to use music stream instead ring stream. To do it you need to disable 'Use default playback stream'. 
You loose option to mute incoming ring with volume buttons but can mute with power button 
Changing stream can also change you max volume level. It usually happens if your max level was 7.
Mute config
Gives option to mute before ringing \nProbably will vibrate on android 5+ as mute is limited \nCan cause vibration only with no ringtone without proper configuration
Can use LED notification for incall status \nPlease check vibrate config full description before you this
Notification config
Due to android os limitation LED works only while screen off
Useful for upcoming silence mode
Logging config
Use it if you have problems or want to help in app development. Use buttons on last tab to send logs
You can watch logging in realtime on Test page
Keep in memory
Will show app icon in notification area Keep app in memory to prevent being closed by memory cleaner

Low priority option hides icon from statusbar but increase chance of closing app when on low memory. \nA way to completely hide icon while function enabled is to go to system settings-> apps -> app -> notification option and disable notification for app. \nYou can take a looking at app restart evens in log to find out do you need to enable this function
Respect silence

Enabling this option force ring on incoming call when phone in mute or vibrate state. If you disabled this option but still have no ring when in vibrate mode please read the full description of the Vibrate config card then

You can also use this option in ase of wrong mode detection: when software buttons on test page works ok but volume does not change on incoming ring. Use test page to check then \nPlease report if your phone need this option enabled
If restore volume does not work
Use it if your phone do not restore sound level after call. No need to disable
Reported devices:\n Nexus 5. Android 5.1.1 time reported = 1 sec
Feedback
Test page let you observe app in work
Upcoming features: \nMute incoming call with volume button when use music stream \nWidget for fast switch vibrate on and off
Find phone
Alter selected number of calls in row from same number within 5 minutes call will ring at max volume
It helps you find phone when you live it somewhere in mute mode
